title: Captain Phillips 2013 CAM XViD - JUSTiCE
description:

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1535109/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1535109/</a>


The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the US-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

Director: Paul Greengrass
Writers: Billy Ray (screenplay), Richard Phillips (based upon the book "A Captain's Duty: Somali Pirates, Navy SEALS, and Dangerous Days at Sea" by)
Stars: Tom Hanks, Barkhad Abdi, Barkhad Abdirahman 
Genres: Action | Adventure | Biography | Crime | Drama | Thriller
Country: USA
Language: English | Somali




Captain Phillips 2013 CAM XViD - JUSTiCE



SOURCE : VIDEO - Patriots VOBS THXS   AUDIO - Patriots VOBS THXS


Video and audio both cleaned and given justice.
Check sample and see.....


Was kindly given the vobs and gotta say their pretty nice,but like all cams it has it issues.
There was borders,some cam movement,fair bit of glare,washed colours etc...
Audio was decent cam audio but needed some TLC.


WORKDONE -

Made a script for the vobs and then dropped that into vdub ...here i cropped the borders,then resized to a decent AR.
Some scenes had pixel issues so had to use a HQ smoother to blend them in.Also tweaked contrast,brightness,rgb levels...before
adding some sharpness back.
Video does had HC english subs when needed,so that was a bonus :)

Audio stripped and remastered in AA,before saving as mp3 and remuxing.

Overall for a cam V7 A6.5 M8
